O

onActionAddAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
Saves the appointment information by calling the insert method from the AppointmentsDao.
onActionAddAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewAppointmentsController
Navigates to the AddAppointmentController.
onActionAddCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
Adds customer to the database.
onActionAddCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewCustomersController
Navigates to the AddCustomerController.
onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
Cancels the input and navigate back to the ViewCustomersController.
onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
Navigates to the ViewCustomersController when OK is selected on the dialog prompt.
onActionCancelAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
Navigates to the ViewAppointmentsController.
onActionCancelAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateAppointmentController
Navigates to the ViewAppointmentsController when OK is selected from the dialog window.
onActionCountrySelected(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
Selects the appropriate First Level Divisions for the selected Country.
onActionCountrySelected(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
Generates First Level Divisions of the selected Country in the Country combo box.
onActionDeleteAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewAppointmentsController
Deletes the selected appointment from the database.
onActionDeleteCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewCustomersController
Deletes the selected customer from the database.
onActionExitProgram(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreenController
Exits the program.
onActionGenerateCountCountry(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportViewerController
Generates the appointment count from the selected country.
onActionGenerateMonthType(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportViewerController
Generates the Appointment Count by Month and Type report.
onActionGoBack(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportViewerController
Navigates to the NavigationScreenController.
onActionGoBack(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewAppointmentsController
Navigates to the NavigationScreenController.
onActionGoBack(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewCustomersController
Navigates to the NavigationScreenController.
onActionLogin(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreenController
Logs the user into the program if credentials are found and displays error on invalid login.
onActionLogOff(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.NavigationScreenController
Used to log off and return to the LoginScreenController.
onActionModifyAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewAppointmentsController
Gathers the information for the selected appointment and navigates to the UpdateAppointmentController.
onActionModifyCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewCustomersController
Gathers the information for the selected customer and navigates to the UpdateCustomerController.
onActionStartDateSelected(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
When the start date is selected, it automatically sets the end date to the same date.
onActionUpdateAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateAppointmentController
Updates the appointment information by using methods from AppointmentsDao and Appointment class.
onActionUpdateCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
Updates the customer information in the database.
onActionViewAppointments(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.NavigationScreenController
Navigates to the ViewAppointmentsController.
onActionViewCustomers(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.NavigationScreenController
Navigates to the ViewCustomersController.
onActionViewReports(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.NavigationScreenController
Navigates to the ReportViewerController.
openConnection() - Static method in class dao.DBConnection
Establishes a connection to the database.
overlap - Static variable in class model.Appointments
Boolean that is used for detecting appointment overlap.
